data.title: New Prague Soccer Club > Home
data.text:
Our History:

New Prague Soccer Club, is a member of MYSA (Minnesota Youth Soccer Association) and SMSL (Southern Minnesota Soccer League), and was developed for the purpose of promoting the game of soccer and sportsmanship for all youth in New Prague, MN and the surrounding communities. In 2010 our club was formed with fewer than 100 players with a goal to introduce soccer to New Prague and the surrounding communities. By 2016, NPSC experienced significant growth and now competes in a variety of facilities (indoor and outdoor) year round with over 530 player registrations and teams competing at the competitive MYSA first division & premier levels, along with the SMSL's black and blue leagues.

Our Mission:

The New Prague Soccer Club is a non-profit organization whose mission is to foster the physical, mental and emotional growth and development of our youth through the sport of soccer at all levels of age and competition. We will have fun playing the game of soccer, and will instill a lifelong passion for the sport in our players.

Our Vision:

New Prague Soccer Club’s vision statement is designed to inspire a clear direction for the club to move in. Our vision is considered to be both desirable and feasible. Our vision is intended to serve as the foundation for decisions regarding goals, policies, and finances.

The New Prague Soccer Club is envisioned to be the preferred competitive soccer club in greater the New Prague Area.

The New Prague Soccer Club will offer highly competitive teams to compete at the highest levels. The competitive program will be supported and supplemented by a strong and robust developmental program through the Club’s Recreational Soccer Program.

The New Prague Soccer Club will be known for developing players. The Club will be a leader in player development and in establishing a lifelong appreciation for the game soccer with its players and parent volunteers. The Club will be a model soccer club for the development of all players from recreational to premier.

The New Prague Soccer Club will provide training for all levels of coaching. Volunteer coaches will have access to certified training through MYSA and other governing bodies to further their knowledge on how to teach the game of soccer to our youth players. The Club will ensure that coaches at our highest levels are qualified and properly certified to coach youth soccer and able to continue the development of players at these levels.

The New Prague Soccer Club will foster and develop relationships in the community and surrounding area to support the growth of soccer and player participation. The Club will partner with other area clubs and programs to ensure players in and around the New Prague Area have a positive soccer experience.

The New Prague Soccer Club will provide the leadership that promotes community involvement, organizational improvements, problem solving, performance measurement and professionalism. The Club will be financially sound, engaging in long-term financial planning to provide a positive soccer experience without undue burden of excessive costs to its players or player’s families.
